long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension lets you select online content by clicking rather than dragging and scrolling.

Download now if you're tired of dealing with the skippy cursors and jumpy screens that come with standard drag-select functionality, or having to start over because you lost your selection while scrolling down the page. Here's a 20-minute clip demonstrating how it works: https://www.youtube.com/shorts/NnNsqdb_B6k

To select web content using this extension:
1. Get it now and pin it to the Chrome Toolbar
1. Click the extension icon
2. Click and confirm your chosen startpoint on the page
3. Click and confirm your chosen endpoint...
4. ...Et voila!

Use Click-to-Select to save your favourite recipes, interesting news articles, fun social media posts - you name it!
